definition: variant of 挽[wan3]/to draw (a cart)/to lament the dead
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: A poem or song composed especially as a lament for a deceased person.
sentences.chinese: 輓歌，輓詩專門爲悼念某一死者所寫的詩或歌。

sentences.english: ChapterOneisabrief introduction of Robert Lowell and his elegiac poetry.
sentences.chinese: 第一章爲洛威爾及其輓詩的簡介。
